headline: Consumers Energy Launches Year-long Plan to Help Kalamazoo Customers Reduce Energy Use and Save Money
summary: Consumers Energy announced today the launch of its year-long "Count on Us Kalamazoo!" initiative as part of the energy provider's commitment to energy waste reduction in some of its most underserved communities. Consumers Energy works to identify those most in need of reducing their energy burden and provides programs, resources and support for select neighbors served by Consumers Energy's electric and/or gas services.
